How do I join the library?

  • Joining the library is easy and membership is free.
  • Either complete the online application form link to online form , or
  • Call in to any Library, complete a form and show two proofs of address.
  • We will give you a library card except at the Mobile Library link to pid 444, where we still operate a ticket system. If at a later date you change your name, address or phone number please tell us so we can keep our records up to date.
  • You can borrow books right away but if you wish to borrow sound recordings or videos we will send you a letter to confirm your address. We will also send a letter if you live outside the area before you can borrow anything.
  • There is no minimum age for children to join the library. We don't need proof of address if you are under 16 but a parent or guardian must sign the form before you can borrow any items.

Your library card is issued subject to the byelaws of the Libraries; in signing your ticket you are amp to comply with these. A copy of the byelaws is available at each library. All information held on our computer is covered by the Data Protection Act and will not be given to any unauthorised person or organisation.
